name: Godot Snake
description:
This is a remake/clone of the game Snake created using the game engine Godot.

*Game does not feature any sound effects or music

*Game does not save highscore

How To Play

The goal of snake is eat as much food as possible to grow the snake and make it as long as you can without colliding with a wall or the snake itself. In this game, you are your own enemy so plan your moves wisely.

Controls
  • Arrow keys to change direction of the snake
  • Space to reset the game (when on the game over screen)
    • Can also click the retry button that appears on the game over screen
